Credits

Acknowledgments

For details on the partners, members, and supporters of NWB please the https://www.nwb.org/ project website. For specific contributions to the format specification and this document see the change logs of the Git repository at https://github.com/NeurodataWithoutBorders/nwb-schema .

Authors

NWB: Version 2.0.0 and later

Documentation for Version 2 of the NWB format and later have been created by Oliver Ruebel and Andrew Tritt et al. in collaboration with the NWB community.

NWB: Version 1.0.x and earlier

Version 1.0.5g (and earlier) of the NWB file format were created by Jeff Teeters et al. as part of the first NWB pilot project. The documents for NWB 2 have been adopted from the final version of format docs released by the original NWB pilot project.
